entries.message:
Event Type: Network Emergency

We are performing system changes in the Singapore location during the following emergency maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-07-15 10:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-07-15 15:00:00 UTC

Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.

We apologize for the inconvenience, but appreciate your understanding while we work to solve this issue.
Thank you for your patience. The maintenance has been completed and at this time all functions returned.

Event Type: Network Emergency

We are performing system changes in the Silicon Valley location during the following emergency maintenance window. 


Start Time: 2022-07-14 12:30:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-07-14 17:30:00 UTC


Servers will remain powered on and there will be no interruption to Public or VPC network connectivity, however system controls will be affected.  During this Maintenance Window you will be unable to issue Power On/Off/Cycle commands, access the VNC Console, deploy new servers, or reinstall existing subscriptions.

We apologize for the inconvenience, but appreciate your understanding while we work to solve this issue.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seattle location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-07-20 18:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-07-20 23:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Seattle instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While itâ€™s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the London location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-07-19 22:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-07-20 02:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, London instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
